title: RAK12025 WisBlock Gyroscope Sensor Module > RAK12025 WisBlock Gyroscope Sensor Module > Product Description > RAK12025 Gyroscope Module Overview
content: RAK12025 is a gyroscope module, part of the RAKWireless WisBlock Sensor series. The module is based on I3G4250D from STMicroelectronics. The I3G4250D is a low-power 3-axis angular rate sensor able to provide unprecedented stability at a zero-rate level and sensitivity over temperature and time. It includes a sensing element and a digital interface capable of providing the measured angular rate. With I3G4250D, RAK12025 can measure rotation speed and report data through a standard I2C digital
parent_content: RAK12025 is a gyroscope module, part of the RAKWireless WisBlock Sensor series. The module is based on I3G4250D from STMicroelectronics. The I3G4250D is a low-power 3-axis angular rate sensor able to provide unprecedented stability at a zero-rate level and sensitivity over temperature and time. It includes a sensing element and a digital interface capable of providing the measured angular rate. With I3G4250D, RAK12025 can measure rotation speed and report data through a standard I2C digital interface.

title: RAK12025 WisBlock Gyroscope Sensor Module > RAK12025 WisBlock Gyroscope Sensor Module > Product Description > RAK12025 Gyroscope Module Overview
content: With I3G4250D, RAK12025 can measure rotation speed and report data through a standard I2C digital interface.
parent_content: RAK12025 is a gyroscope module, part of the RAKWireless WisBlock Sensor series. The module is based on I3G4250D from STMicroelectronics. The I3G4250D is a low-power 3-axis angular rate sensor able to provide unprecedented stability at a zero-rate level and sensitivity over temperature and time. It includes a sensing element and a digital interface capable of providing the measured angular rate. With I3G4250D, RAK12025 can measure rotation speed and report data through a standard I2C digital interface.

title: RAK12025 WisBlock Gyroscope Sensor Module > RAK12025 WisBlock Gyroscope Sensor Module > Prerequisites > RAK12025 Module Requirements and Setup
content:
To use a **RAK12025**, you need at least a **WisBlock Base board** to plug the module in. **WisBlock Base board** provides power supply to the **RAK12025** module. Furthermore, you need a **WisBlock Core** module to use the sensor.  
> **WARNING:** Make sure to fix the module with the screws to ensure a proper function.
parent_content:
To use a **RAK12025**, you need at least a **WisBlock Base board** to plug the module in. **WisBlock Base board** provides power supply to the **RAK12025** module. Furthermore, you need a **WisBlock Core** module to use the sensor.  
> **WARNING:** Make sure to fix the module with the screws to ensure a proper function.
